lead_paragraph: Dale Weise scored the go-ahead goal late in the second period and the Chicago Blackhawks staved off elimination with a 6-3 comeback win over the St. Louis Blues on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Stave Off Elimination, Beat Blues 6-3
headline.main: Blackhawks Stave Off Elimination, Beat Blues 6-3
